Unleash your inner musician with Rhythm & Riffs. Explore Instruments About Us Welcome to Rhythm & Riffs, your ultimate destination for high-quality musical instruments and accessories. Founded with a passion for music and a commitment to excellence, Rhythm & Riffs has been serving musicians of all levels since 1986. Questions What types of musical instruments do you offer? We offer a wide range of musical instruments, including guitars, keyboards, drums, brass and woodwind instruments, string instruments, and more. With over 2400 instruments in our collection, we have something for every musician Do you provide instrument repair and maintenance services? Yes, we offer expert repair and maintenance services for all types of musical instruments. Our team of skilled technicians is dedicated to keeping your instruments in top condition Can I try out the instruments before purchasing? Absolutely! We encourage you to visit our store and try out any instrument you're interested in. Our knowledgeable staff will be happy to assist you and provide any information you need Do you offer any warranties on your instruments? Yes, we offer warranties on many of our instruments. The terms and duration of the warranty vary by product and brand. Please ask our staff for specific details regarding warranties on the instruments you are interested in. What payment methods do you accept? We accept a variety of payment methods, including credit and debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. We also offer financing options to help make your purchase more affordable. Do you offer lessons for beginners? Yes, we offer music lessons for beginners as well as for more advanced players. Our experienced instructors can help you learn and improve your skills on a variety of instruments. Contact us to schedule a lesson Our Clients Rhythm & Riffs helped me find the perfect guitar. Their expertise and friendly service made all the differenceEmily S. The selection at Rhythm & Riffs is unparalleled. I found exactly what I needed for my studio setupJake M. Exceptional customer service and top-quality instruments. Rhythm & Riffs is my go-to music storeSarah L. pages.privacy-policy: Rhythm & Riffs - Privacy Policy Instruments Our story Advantages Questions Contacts Instruments Our story Advantages Questions Contacts Privacy Policy At Rhythm & Riffs, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information. Information We Collect: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment details when you make a purchase, sign up for our newsletter, or contact us. How We Use Your Information: To process and fulfill your orders To provide customer support To send you promotional materials and updates (you can opt out at any time) To improve our products and services How We Protect Your Information: We implement various security measures to ensure the safety of your personal information. Your data is stored on secure servers, and we use encryption for sensitive information such as payment details. Third-Party Disclosure: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties, except as necessary to fulfill your orders or comply with legal requirements. Changes to Our Privacy Policy: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the revised date will be noted at the top. For more information, please contact us at email: rhythmandriffs@gmail.com Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Verna Charichhak, Odisha 762023 +91-114-3048232 rhythmandriffs@gmail.com
pages.terms-conditions: Rhythm & Riffs - Terms and Conditions Instruments Our story Advantages Questions Contacts Instruments Our story Advantages Questions Contacts Terms and Conditions Welcome to Rhythm & Riffs. By using our website and purchasing our products, you agree to the following terms and conditions: Product Information: We strive to provide accurate descriptions and images of our products. However, we do not guarantee that all information is completely accurate, current, or error-free. Pricing: All prices are listed in USD and are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right to correct any pricing errors that may occur. Orders: By placing an order, you agree to pay the listed price for the products and any applicable shipping fees. We reserve the right to cancel or refuse any order at our discretion. Shipping: We ship our products worldwide. Shipping times and costs will vary based on your location and the shipping method selected. We are not responsible for any delays or damages during transit. Returns and Refunds: We offer a 30-day return policy on most products. To be eligible for a return, the item must be unused and in its original condition. Please contact us to initiate a return. Refunds will be issued to the original payment method. Warranty: Many of our products come with a manufacturer's warranty. Please refer to the specific product page for warranty details. Limitation of Liability: Rhythm & Riffs is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of our products or website. Governing Law: These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of New York, USA. Any disputes arising from the use of our website or products will be resolved in the state or federal courts of New York. Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Verna Charichhak, Odisha 762023 +91-114-3048232 rhythmandriffs@gmail.com
